channel.title: /login?
channel.description:
I've noticed that a lot of people who join the server either cannot work out how the /login command works, I think they try logging in with their actual minecraft password and then when they realize it doesn't work they just give up trying.
We need a /register command, that connects to the forums automatically, so people wont need to open up a browser and go through all the registering etc for a server they may not even like.
I know that /login isn't hard to understand at all but you know what some people are like on the internet.

item.title: /login?
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie

I’ve noticed that a lot of people who join the server either cannot work out how the /login command works, I think they try logging in with their actual minecraft password and then when they realize it doesn’t work they just give up trying.

We need a /register command, that connects to the forums automatically, so people wont need to open up a browser and go through all the registering etc for a server they may not even like.

I know that /login isn’t hard to understand at all but you know what some people are like on the internet.
